item.title: It's All Junk
item.author: drunkensage82@gmail.com (Drunken Sage)
item.description: Why is everything I buy a piece of shit? Something I have noticed more and more, is just how terribly everything is built anymore. From furniture, homes, clothing, electronics, you name it….it is all junk!!! For me, this has been pretty obvious, as I have watched product quality decline more and more ove rmy life. But it seems to be hitting all time lows. Recently I decided to be on the lookout for an antique can opener, just because you can’t buy a hand crank can opener anymore that will open even a dozen cans without breaking…one of the many things that still trigger anger in me, and do it pretty quickly!
